getBalances(address[],address[]).details: Pass 0x0 as a "token" address to get ETH balance. Possible error throws: - extremely large arrays for account and or tokens (gas cost too high)

returns._0: a one-dimensional that's user.length * tokens.length long. The array is ordered by all of the 0th accounts token balances, then the 1th user, and so on.

getBalances(address[],address[]).notice: Checks the token balances of accounts for multiple tokens.
